record.title: ORDER OF PROCEDURE

speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, I ask unanimous consent that the order of speakers be the following: Senator Harkin, myself, for 20 minutes; Senator Sessions for 15 minutes; Senator Bingaman, 30 minutes; Senator Allard, 10 minutes; Senator Levin, 20 minutes; Senator Murkowski, 30 minutes; Senators Burr and Dole, 15 minutes together; Senator Dorgan, 25 minutes; Senator Kyl, 10 minutes; Senator Cardin, 10 minutes; Senator Cornyn, 15 minutes; Senator Menendez, 10 minutes; Senator Bond, 10 minutes; Senator Kennedy, 10 minutes; Senator Alexander, 20 minutes; Senator Cantwell, 20 minutes; and Senator Collins, 7 minutes.

record.chair: Without objection, it is so ordered.
